    Projects

    Personal projects both completed and in progress!

    CNN to Lego Construction

    Fueled by my interests in general assembler robotics, this project aims to use CNN and complex control to assemble 1st grade level legos from an instruction booklet.

    Chaotic Pendulum with Dead Reckoning

    A project designed around modular develop and study of the chaotic movement of a double, triple, or quadruple pendulum.

    High Speed RC Cars

    Making RC cars go fast by optimizing suspension, ESC, and build configurations.

    Analysis of Development Optimal Global Fund Flow

    A Pet Project Using AI to Tackle a Really Complex Problem: the underlying common goals between seemingly disjoint fields of science, and where the farthest step forward lie in theoretical and fundamental research.

    NLP to 3D Mesh Gen Model

    With the explosion of Natural Language Processing and Large Language Models as used in chat bots like Chat GPT, Bard, and Loebner Award Winning Mitsuko, I want to create a CAD tool similar to DALL-E but for generative stl meshes.

    Peltier Cloud Chamber

    Who doesnâ€™t want to view subatomic particles flying through our atmosphere? A Cloud chamber is a relatively old-school device for subatomic particle viewing.

    High Wavelength SLS

    Exploring the use of cheap blue ray lasers (around 390-405 nm) and a thermoplastic with high absorptivity to study hobbyist-market SLS printers.
